ygData.subject: Re: Geez!
ygData.msgSnippet: the guy on Cazic-Thule who has the book is going to post a screen pic of the book on their web site www.shadowedsoul.com it s not there yet, but keep checking
ygData.messageBody:
the guy on Cazic-Thule who has the book is going to post a screen pic of the
book on their web site www.shadowedsoul.com
it's not there yet, but keep checking back
I think it was available a while ago but isn't anymore because some of the
recipe's don't work and they took the book out, but he says it is
I don't know how recently he's tried to get it

Fixer, gnomish enchanter, Cazic-Thule

> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
> What will it take to get it through to you guys? There is NO damn third
> book, ANY formulas for items that have been figured out how to be made, if
> any at all were figured out by trial and error. There is absolutely NO
BOOK!
> NONE not -ANYWHERE- in the game! When there IS something will be said
about
> it in the patch. Until then , just work on raising your tinkering skill,
> thats all I can say, doing anything else about tinkering, like trying to
> find a non-existant book, or trying to figure out a formula with next to
> nothing odds is just a TOTAL 100% waste of time!
>
